A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean old woman who keeps a young man caged in her basement. He is the son of an accidental murder that the old woman and Alice’s father and mother sacrificed to a pack of wild, hungry horned hound hounds that feed off the dead.
